syn 0.0.0.9930
  • Reference
  • Changelog

syn

Source: R/syn-package.R, R/syn.R
syn.Rd

syn provides a dependency free way to get synonyms of words.

syn(word, n_words = -1)

Arguments

word

character, one word you want to find synonyms for
n_words

integer, the number of words to look for. An integer Default is all words

Value

synonyms of the word you entered

See also

It's main functions are:

  • syn()

  • syns()

Learn more about syn at syn.njtierney.com

Examples

# put some examples here
syn("good")
#>   [1] "able to pay"          "absolutely"           "acceptable"          
#>   [4] "accomplished"         "according to Hoyle"   "ace"

syn("evil", 25)
#>  [1] "black"       "trouble"     "not done"    "curse"       "abominable" 
#>  [6] "infamy"      "invalid"     "error"       "repugnant"   "shameful"   
#> [11] "uncleanness" "deadly"      "anxiety"     "fateful"     "horrible"   
#> [16] "deleterious" "hideous"     "bane"        "hateful"     "unsuitable"
